summary: Summer of dissent, Israel-Iran conflict, and leadership shifts across Asia and Europe.

events.details: Lee Jae-myung wins presidency following Yoon's impeachment.
Airstrikes hit Iranian nuclear facilities, killing senior IRGC commanders.
Mass US demonstrations coincide with a presidential military parade and AI propaganda videos.
Private ISS mission launches carrying the first Polish and Indian astronauts in decades.
Karol Nawrocki wins, consolidating conservative power in Warsaw.
B-2 bombers target Fordow and Natanz sites after Israeli request.
Missile barrages hit US bases in Qatar and Iraq, spiking oil prices.
Partnership announced to manufacture AI data center racks and cabling in the US.
